name: Aroma de Nicaragua - Original Blend Connecticut - Gordo
brand: Aroma de Nicaragua, Original Blend Connecticut
additionalNotes: Aroma de Nicaragua is a High Quality Cigar coming from Nicaragua where all the winner brands are born, over 25 years of experience come together harvesting and selecting the finest leaves of Tobacco. According to the company, the Nicaraguan tobacco used in its blends is grown all four of the growing regions of the country: Condega, Estel√≠, Jalapa and Ometepe. Original Blend Connecticut comes with the same binder and filler tobacco combination from Nicaragua as the Ecuador blend, but with a Connecticut wrapper.
